name: Comprehensive meeting
description: In this meeting you will find several talks focused on the care of disabled people. We will have the presence of different expert doctors in this area. We will enjoy the presence of Dr. Maria Cristina Latorre Domingo (Spain), John Michels (USA) and Mauro La Pietra (Italy)

name: Solidary run
description: This Friday will be the last edition of the Solidarity race. As always, you are invited to participate in this non-profit career. All the money raised will go to research against Down syndrome. See you there!

name: Barbecue in the park
description: During the next Saturday we will celebrate a barbecue in order to promote socialization among residents in our centers. Any person who makes use of our services will enjoy an offer at the barbecue. Standard price - 10 Euro Partner price - 6 Euro

name: Conference "welfare food"
description: This Thursday a new conference on the relationship between health and food will take place. We can enjoy a master class from one of the best Spanish chefs of recent times, David Mu√±oz. There will also be a small tasting after the talk to all attendees. Attendance at the conference is free, due to the aid received from the government.

name: Football tournament against cancer
description: As in the last three years, the last Saturday of June will take place the tournament against cancer in Milan. We will have the fields of the CUS to host the tournament. The price of registration per team is 25 Euro, which will go to research the cure of cancer. The winning team will be awarded a cup.
